senses.sense_definition: The capital and largest city of Northern Ireland, known for its maritime history and shipyards.

examples.text: We took a ferry across the Irish Sea to visit <w>Belfast</w>.
The famous ship Titanic was designed and built in <w>Belfast</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A town, city, or community in various countries (such as the United States, Canada, or New Zealand) named after the capital of Northern Ireland.

examples.text: She grew up in the small coastal city of <w>Belfast</w>, Maine.
Many settlers named their new communities <w>Belfast</w> to honor their homeland.
